column4: Then i do think you won't be the only one without any clue. The teacher will surely teach you how to compile  Java code
yes i already know how to compile but i want to know basics like Hello world etc
i knew Html already so i got a A+ and i like that :P
Well then try googling "java basics" or sth. Java has a huge API but don't be intimidated, ignore it for now. :)
